span.span: The entity type of the collection.

summary.span: 表示关系“多”端的对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects on the "many" end of a relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是特定实体类型的对象集合，该实体类型表示一对多或多对多关系的“多”端。An is a collection of objects of a particular entity type that represents the "many" end of a one-to-many or many-to-many relationship. 由导航属性返回一个 。An is returned by a navigation property. 使用 方法可以将相关对象加载到 中。Use the method to load related objects into an . 要存储特定实体类型的对象的非相关集合，例如 的结果，请使用 类的实例。To store an unrelated collection of objects of a specific entity type, such as the result of an , use an instance of the class. 可能有对应的 。An might have a corresponding . 当 和 模型位于同一关系的相反端时，该关系的完整性维持在对象级别。When an and an model opposite ends of the same relationship, the integrity of the relationship is maintained at the object level. 两个类自动同步。The two classes are synchronized automatically. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. ## Examples 本示例基于。This example is based on the . 若要运行此示例中的代码，必须已将 AdventureWorks 销售模型添加到你的项目中，并将项目配置为使用实体框架。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要执行此操作，请完成中的过程[如何： 手动配置实体框架项目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)并[如何： 手动定义模型和映射文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: 1. 创建两个新的 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体并添加到 `Contact` 实体。Creates two new `SalesOrderHeader` entities and adds them to the `Contact` entity. 2. 从与 实体关联的 `Contact` 中获取所有相关端。Gets all related ends from the that is associated with the `Contact` entity. 3. 循环访问 集合。Iterates through the collection of s. 4. 获取每个相关端的 。Gets the for each related end. 5. 使用 方法从集合中移除其中一个实体。Uses the method to remove one of the entities from the collection. 6. 调用 方法确定该对象是否已从集合中移除。Calls the method to determine whether the object was removed from the collection. 7. 使用 方法添加回实体。Uses the method to add the entity back. remarks.format: ## Remarks 的此公开构造函数旨在供对象服务在反序列化对象图时使用。This public constructor for is intended to be used by Object Services when deserializing object graphs. 应从导航属性而不是使用此构造函数访问 的实例。You should access an instance of from a navigation property instead of using this constructor. 要存储特定实体类型的对象的非相关集合，例如 的结果，请使用 的实例。To store an unrelated collection of objects of a specific entity type, such as the result of an , use an instance of .

must implement .

summary.span: 将对象添加到集合。

span.span: Adds an object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将对象添加到 并创建两个对象之间的关系。The method adds an object to an and creates a relationship between the two objects. 当源对象附加到 实例时， 方法也将对象添加到 。When the source object is attached to an instance, the method also adds the object to the . 当调用 时，此操作转换为插入到数据源中的操作。This operation is translated into an insert operation in the data source when is called. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建、 添加、 修改和删除对象](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1)。For more information, see [Creating, Adding, Modifying, and Deleting Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1). 可对同一对象实例多次调用 方法。The method can be called multiple times on the same object instance. ## Examples 本示例基于。This example is based on the . 若要运行此示例中的代码，必须已将 AdventureWorks 销售模型添加到你的项目中，并将项目配置为使用实体框架。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要执行此操作，请完成中的过程[如何： 手动配置实体框架项目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)并[如何： 手动定义模型和映射文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此示例创建两个新的 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体，将它们添加到 `Contact` 实体，然后在移除对象后，使用 方法将该对象添加回集合。This example creates two new `SalesOrderHeader` entities, adds them to the `Contact` entity, and, after removing an object, uses the method to add the object back to the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend_add)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend_add)]

summary.span: 定义对象上下文中对象和相关对象集合之间的关系。

span.span: Defines relationships between an object and a collection of related objects in an object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于定义当源对象和相关对象集合已经存在于对象上下文中时两者之间的关系.The method is used to define relationships between an object and a collection of related objects when both the source object and the collection of related objects already exist in the object context. 要附加已经定义了关系的对象或对象图，请对 调用 方法。To attach an object or an object graph where the relationships are already defined, call the method on the . 要创建与源对象关联的新对象，请对 调用 方法。To create a new object that is related to the source object, call the method on the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加和分离对象](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 如果集合已经填充或部分填充， 方法将现有实体和给定实体合并。If the collection is already filled or partially filled, the method merges existing entities with the given entities. 不假定给定实体为相关实体的完整集。The given entities are not assumed to be the complete set of related entities. 所有传递的实体必须处于 或 状态。All entities passed in must be in the or state. 仅当状态管理器正在跟踪关系实例时，允许 状态的对象。Objects in the state are only allowed when the state manager is already tracking the relationship instance.

span.span: collection is .

exception.span: 源对象或 集合中的对象为 或者不处于 或 状态。

span.span: The relationship cannot be defined based on the EDM metadata.

exception.span: 这会在概念性架构中的关联不支持两种类型间的关系时发生。

span.span: This can occur when the association in the conceptual schema does not support a relationship between the two types.

span.span: The object being attached.

summary.span: 定义对象上下文中两个附加对象之间的关系。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two attached objects in an object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于定义当两个对象已经存在于对象上下文中时两者之间的关系。The method is used to define relationships between two objects when both objects already exist in the object context. 要附加已经定义了关系的对象或对象图，请对 调用 方法。To attach an object or an object graph where the relationships are already defined, call the method on the . 要创建与源对象关联的新对象，请对 调用 方法。To create a new object that is related to the source object, call the method on the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加和分离对象](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 如果 已经加载对象， 方法将把该对象与 中的现有对象合并。If the already has loaded objects, the method merges the object together with the existing objects in the . 不假定附加的对象为相关实体对象的完整集。The attached object is not assumed to be the complete set of related entity objects. 与此 关联的对象以及附加到它的所有对象必须处于 或 状态。The object associated with this and all objects being attached to it must be in an or state. 处于 状态的对象只能在 已经跟踪关系实例时附加。Objects in the state can only be attached when the is already tracking the relationship instance. ## Examples 本示例基于。This example is based on the . 若要运行此示例中的代码，必须已将 AdventureWorks 销售模型添加到你的项目中，并将项目配置为使用实体框架。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要执行此操作，请完成中的过程[如何： 手动配置实体框架项目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)并[如何： 手动定义模型和映射文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此示例附加已分离的集合`SalesOrderDetail`对象和已分离`SalesOrderHeader`对象传递给对象上下文，然后定义之间的关系`SalesOrderHeader`对象和每个`SalesOrderDetail`对象。This example attaches a collection of detached `SalesOrderDetail` objects and a detached `SalesOrderHeader` object to an object context, and then defines the relationships between the `SalesOrderHeader` object and each `SalesOrderDetail` object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AttachRelatedObjects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#attachrelatedobjects)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AttachRelatedObjects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#attachrelatedobjects)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法来比较指定对象和集合中已经存在的对象。Uses the method to compare the specified object with the objects already in the collection. ## Examples 本示例基于。This example is based on the . 若要运行此示例中的代码，必须已将 AdventureWorks 销售模型添加到你的项目中，并将项目配置为使用实体框架。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要执行此操作，请完成中的过程[如何： 手动配置实体框架项目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)并[如何： 手动定义模型和映射文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 此示例将执行下列操作：This example does the following: 1. 创建两个新的 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体并添加到 `Contact` 实体。Creates two new `SalesOrderHeader` entities and adds them to the `Contact` entity. 2. 从与 Contact 实体关联的 中获取所有相关端。Gets all related ends from the that is associated with the Contact entity. 3. 循环访问 集合。Iterates through the collection of s. 4. 获取每个相关端的 。Gets the for each related end. 5. 使用 方法从集合中移除其中一个实体。Uses the method to remove one of the entities from the collection. 6. 调用 方法确定该对象是否已从集合中移除。Calls the method to determine whether the object was removed from the collection. 7. 使用 方法添加回实体。Uses the method to add the entity back. summary.span: 获取集合中包含的对象数。

span.span: Gets the number of objects that are contained in the collection.
The number of elements that are contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取当前本地集合中的实体数量，而不反映数据源中的集合大小。The property gets the number of entities currently in the local collection and does not reflect the size of the collection in the data source. 零计数不一定表示相关集合为空。A count of zero does not necessarily indicate that the related collection is empty. 要确定数据源中的集合大小，请调用 方法或在查询路径中包含相关对象。To determine the collection size in the data source, call the method or include the related object in the query path. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

summary.span: 返回一个对象查询，执行该查询时返回的对象集合与当前集合包含的对象相同。

span.span: Returns an object query that, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that exists in the current collection.
An that represents the entity collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于获得 的新实例，该实例返回同一对象集。This property is used to obtain a new instance of that returns the same set of objects. 对于更复杂的联接、联合或筛选查询，或者使用 选项返回处于已分离状态的相同对象，这可以作为起点。This is useful as the starting point for a more complex join, union, or filtered query, or to return the same objects in a detached state by using the option. 用于筛选中的对象以便可以将绑定仅限特定类型的对象。 is used to filter objects in an to enable you to bind only objects of a specific type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象绑定到控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b)。For more information, see [Binding Objects to Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b). ## Examples 此示例基于的修改版本。This example is based on a modified version of the . 此版本支持每种类型一个表继承，并使用 `Course` 作为抽象类型。This version supports table-per-type inheritance with `Course` as an abstract type. 完成以下演练以便修改 School 模型以支持使用本主题中的每个类型一个表继承示例。Complete the walkthrough to modify the School model to support the table-per-type inheritance example used in this topic. 此示例演示如何使用中的筛选器对象并绑定到特定类型的对象。This example shows how to use to filter objects in an and bind only to objects of a specific type. 此示例的完整版本，请参阅[如何： 将控件绑定到派生类型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09730c14-3b7b-4563-af4a-7ecfa4e34bd5)。For a complete version of this example, see [How to: Bind Controls to Derived Types](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09730c14-3b7b-4563-af4a-7ecfa4e34bd5).

exception.span: 当对象处于 状态时。

span.span: When the object is in an state.
-or-

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用内部`RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad`方法，然后才能加载到调用的集合，验证具有正确的条件。This method calls the internal `RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad` method before loading the collection, which validates that a call to has the correct conditions. `RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad`方法检查：The `RelatedEnd.ValidateLoad` method checks that: * 一个有效存在。A valid exists. * 该实体不在状态。The entity isn't in a state. * 有关必须是当且仅当源实体是。 for must be if and only if the source entity was . 如果源实体已检索与任何其他，则可以是任何内容，但是(例如，实体可以加载后和选项可以是).If the source entity was retrieved with any other , the can be anything but (for example, the entity could have been loaded with and the option can be ). * 如果`mergeOption`是，不调用已经加载实体和对非空，不跟踪不调用。If `mergeOption` is , isn't called on an already loaded entity and isn't called on a non-empty, not-tracked . 当集合中的对象已加载到，则方法强制执行指定的`mergeOption`参数。When objects in the collection are already loaded into the , the method enforces the specified by the `mergeOption` parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 若要显式加载相关的对象，必须调用`Load`导航属性返回的相关端的方法。To explicitly load related objects, you must call the `Load` method on the related end returned by the navigation property. 对于一个对多关系，调用方法。For a one-to-many relationship, call the method on . 对于一对一的关系，请调用上。For a one-to-one relationship, call the on . 这样可将相关对象数据加载到对象上下文中。This loads the related object data into the object context. 您可以通过使用返回的结果的集合进行枚举`foreach`循环 (`For Each...Next`在 Visual Basic 中)，并有条件地调用`Load`方法和结果中每个实体的属性。You can enumerate through the collection of returned results using a `foreach` loop (`For Each...Next` in Visual Basic) and conditionally call the `Load` method on and properties for each entity in the results. 方法加载相关的对象从数据源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. > [!NOTE] > 当您在 (C#) 或 `foreach` (Visual Basic) 枚举过程中调用 `For Each` 方法时，对象服务会尝试打开一个新的数据读取器。When you call the method during a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) enumeration, Object Services tries to open a new data reader. 除非您已经通过在连接字符串中指定 `multipleactiveresultsets=true` 启用了多个活动结果集，否则此操作将失败。This operation will fail unless you have enabled multiple active results sets by specifying `multipleactiveresultsets=true` in the connection string. 还可以将查询的结果加载到一个 集合中。You can also load the result of the query into a collection. 这样将关闭数据读取器，并允许您对集合进行枚举来加载引用的对象。This closes the data reader and enables you to enumerate over the collection to load referenced objects. 方法与 方法同步。The method is synchronized with the method. ## Examples 本示例基于。This example is based on the . 若要运行此示例中的代码，必须已将 AdventureWorks 销售模型添加到你的项目中，并将项目配置为使用实体框架。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要执行此操作，请完成中的过程[如何： 手动配置实体框架项目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)并[如何： 手动定义模型和映射文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 本示例为 `SalesOrderHeader` 实体加载相关 `Contact` 对象。This example loads the related `SalesOrderHeader` objects for the `Contact` entity. Public Function Remove (entity As TEntity) As Boolean

param.name: entity
param.span: 要从集合中移除的对象。

span.span: The object to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合移除对象，并标记要删除的关系。

span.span: Removes an object from the collection and marks the relationship for deletion.

returns.span: 如果成功移除了该项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if item was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法也删除源对象和要从集合中移除的对象之间的关系。The method also deletes the relationship between the source object and the object being removed from the collection. 如果关系具有引用完整性约束，在依赖对象上调用 方法将标记关系和依赖对象进行删除。If the relationship has a referential integrity constraint, calling the method on a dependent object marks both the relationship and the dependent object for deletion. 发生此现象的原因是约束指示依赖对象在与父对象没有关系的情况下无法存在。This occurs because the constraint indicates that the dependent object cannot exist without a relationship to the parent. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ReferentialConstraint 元素 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24f96a80-85b5-4f2e-a14c-0e3eb6796fa0)。For more information, see [ReferentialConstraint Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24f96a80-85b5-4f2e-a14c-0e3eb6796fa0). 返回`false`指定的对象不在集合中时。 returns `false` when the specified object is not in the collection. ## Examples 本示例基于。This example is based on the . 若要运行此示例中的代码，必须已将 AdventureWorks 销售模型添加到你的项目中，并将项目配置为使用实体框架。To run the code in this example, you must have already added the AdventureWorks Sales Model to your project and configured your project to use the Entity Framework. 若要执行此操作，请完成中的过程[如何： 手动配置实体框架项目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e)并[如何： 手动定义模型和映射文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a)。To do this, complete the procedures in [How to: Manually Configure an Entity Framework Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73f6ae1d-b3b2-4577-aebd-ad5a75954e9e) and [How to: Manually Define the Model and Mapping Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4fd6864-f2a1-48f0-aa32-1e318775a99a). 本示例使用 方法从集合中移除一个实体，然后调用 方法确定该对象是否从集合中移除。This example uses the method to remove one of the entities from the collection and then calls the method to determine whether the object was removed from the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend_add)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd_Add](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend_add)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

An of entity objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法实现与 的数据绑定。This method enables data binding to an . 它由绑定到集合的控件进行调用。It is called by the control bound to the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象绑定到控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b)。For more information, see [Binding Objects to Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fd34855-929b-4303-a91e-4bb69d958f2b).
